availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda Bell Gardiner in Nelson County on August 8, 1841. Father of Ann Gardiner, James Gardiner, Sarah E. Gardiner, Kate Gardiner, and Stephen Gardiner. Merchant in Nelson County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Nelson County in 1850. Merchant in Nelson County in 1860. Employed James Gardiner as a clerk in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 258.
